job_description:
Design and implement scalable and efficient machine learning solutions on the Azure platform.
• Develop end-to-end machine learning pipelines, including data preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and deployment.
• Integrate machine learning models and solutions with other Azure services, such as Azure Databricks, Azure Data Lake Storage, and Azure SQL Data Warehouse.
• Optimize machine learning models for performance, scalability, and cost-efficiency in the Azure cloud environment.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams
• Azure Machine Learning Services
• Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn
• Big data technologies (Spark, Hadoop)
• Data storage solutions (Azure Data Lake, Azure SQL Data Warehouse)
• Version control (e.g., Git)
• Containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
• Monitoring and logging tools
• Security and compliance standards

Responsibilities: Design and implement scalable and efficient machine learning solutions on the Azure platform
Develop end-to-end machine learning pipelines, including data preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and deployment
Integrate machine learning models and solutions with other Azure services, such as Azure Databricks, Azure Data Lake Storage, and Azure SQL Data Warehouse
Optimize machine learning models for performance, scalability, and cost-efficiency in the Azure cloud environment
